artist: Author: Antoine François Prévost, called  Abbé Prévost; Author: Introduction by J. Lewis May; Illustrator: John Austen; Publisher: Geoffrey Bles
creditline: The Frank P. Leslie Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie in memory of Mr. and Mrs. John Leslie
description: Half vellum and blue cloth with gold-tooled lettering and marbled endpapers. With an Introduction by J. Lewis May. First edition; 142 pp.
markings: Numbered in black ink on the colophon page: 152
medium: Color lithographs, black-and-white illustrations, and letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Frank P. Leslie, Wayzata, Minn. given to MIA, 1967.
signed: Signed black ink on the colophon page: John Austen
title: Manon Lescaut from the French of L'Abbè Prèvost
